summary: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The type of resource being processed.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the list of items.

parameters.name: field to split out
parameters.description: The name of the input field to break out into separate items.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items.

parameters.name: fields to include
parameters.description: Fields to include in the new items.

parameters.name: fields to aggregate
parameters.description: Fields to aggregate in the new item.
